pinyin: Shi4 jie4 Mao4 yi4 Zhong1 xin1

definition: easy/amiable/to change/to exchange/prefix corresponding to the English adjective suffix "-able" or "-ible"
surname Yi/abbr. for 易經|易经[Yi4 jing1], the Book of Changes
to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)

sentences.english: A: Zhejiang World Trade Centre, please.
The two tower buildings of the World Trade Center have disappeared from the map of New York.
sentences.chinese: 世界贸易中心的两座塔楼已从纽约的地图上消失了。

sentences.english: Photo taken from the top of World Trade Center. PHOTOGRAPH BY: Mark Boster / Los Angeles Times
sentences.chinese: 照片摄自于世界贸易中心的顶部。

sentences.english: Photo taken from top of the World Trade Center. PHOTOGRAPH BY: Mark Boster / Los Angeles Times
sentences.chinese: 摄自世界贸易中心大楼顶部。

sentences.english: Could you take me to the World Trade Center?
sentences.chinese: 您能送我到世界贸易中心吗？

sentences.english: Shoping in World trade Center & friendship store Taojin Road Guangzhou with my love Kate.
sentences.chinese: 和淑芬一起到淘金路世界贸易中心，友谊商店逛逛。

sentences.english: The World Trade Center opened in nineteen seventy-three.
sentences.chinese: 世界贸易中心于一九七三年。

definition: (used in the names of grand buildings such as 百老匯大廈|百老汇大厦 Broadway Mansions (in Shanghai) or 帝國大廈|帝国大厦 Empire State Building etc)
building (a relatively large, multi-storey one)/CL:幢[zhuang4],座[zuo4]
Manhattan island/Manhattan borough of New York City
Jin Mao Tower, skyscraper in Shanghai

pinyin: Shang4 hai3 Huan2 qiu2 Jin1 rong2 Zhong1 xin1

definition: World Trade Organization (WTO)/abbr. for 世界貿易組織|世界贸易组织
